trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref> object to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: 将转换<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>对象与其他类型。

trans-unit.source: The KeyGestureConverter class only converts an instance <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> to and from a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 一个实例<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>与一种<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> ，仅将转换 KeyGestureConverter 类

trans-unit.source: The KeyGestureConverter converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" character as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the key.
trans-unit.target: 与从转换 KeyGestureConverter <xref:System.String>"+"字符用作修饰符密钥和密钥之间的分隔符。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+A` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在字符串`Control+A`将转换为<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>与<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>属性等于<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>等于<xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>属性</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys></xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.target: 确定指定类型的对象是否可以转换为的实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>，使用指定的上下文。

trans-unit.target: 计算用于转换类型。

trans-unit.target: 确定实例是否<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>可以转换为指定的类型，使用指定的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将转换到指定的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture"> </xref>，使用指定的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>与从转换<xref:System.String>使用"+"密钥作为修改键和键之间的分隔符。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+A` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在字符串`Control+A`将转换为<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>与<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>属性等于<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>等于<xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>属性</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys></xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>

trans-unit.target: 提供有关从中调用此转换器的环境的信息的格式上下文。

trans-unit.source: `destinationType` must be <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: `destinationType`必须是<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>与从转换<xref:System.String>使用"+"密钥作为修改键和键之间的分隔符。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGestureConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> would be converted into the string `Control+A`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>与<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A>属性等于<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A>属性等于<xref:System.Windows.Input.Key>将转换为字符串`Control+A`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Key> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Key%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>
